version_description:
We’ve revamped our DG Digital Coupon experience with several great new features.

You can now Log Out of your Account, update your Profile information or change your Password all from within the App with the all-new Account Settings screen!

We’ve also made it easier for you to find the Digital Coupons you want. You can now Search for Digital Coupons by keyword or with the redesigned Sorting and Category Filters screen. 

Don’t have a Digital Coupon account yet? No problem! The Sign Up process is now built in to the app, so you can to get from Sign Up to Savings quickly and seamlessly.

And finally, we’ve made several design tweaks and performance updates throughout the app.

And finally, we’ve made several design tweaks and performance updates throughout the app.

You can now Log Out of your Account, update your Profile information or change your Password all from within the App with the all-new Account Settings screen!

We’ve also made it easier for you to find the Digital Coupons you want. You can now Search for Digital Coupons by keyword or with the redesigned Sorting and Category Filters screen.

We've fixed the bug preventing you from being able to register for a new DG Digital Coupon account, along with other minor improvements.
We've fixed the bug preventing you from being able to register for a new DG Digital Coupon account, along with other minor improvements.
Bluetooth message continuously showing along with a few other minor updates
Bluetooth message continuously showing along with a few other minor updates

Want extra password security? We now allow for special characters to be used in your Digital Coupon account password. Also, you'll now be able to access Beacon-triggered alerts in your in-app Notifications Tray, so you'll never miss out on extra savings.

Experiencing problems with DG Digital Coupons? Submit your technical concerns or feedback here: http://dolr.us/rdb

Want extra password security? We now allow for special characters to be used in your Digital Coupon account password. Also, you'll now be able to access Beacon-triggered alerts in your in-app Notifications Tray, so you'll never miss out on extra savings.

Experiencing problems with DG Digital Coupons? Submit your technical concerns or feedback here: http://dolr.us/rdb

Minor enhancements include: minimizing the pop-ups asking you to enable Bluetooth, improving Digital coupons sorting and adding new badge icons that allow you to see which of coupons you've added are manufacturer coupons.

Minor enhancements include: minimizing the pop-ups asking you to enable Bluetooth, improving Digital coupons sorting and adding new badge icons that allow you to see which of coupons you've added are manufacturer coupons.

If you loved the DG app before, wait until you check out our new and improved updates! Featuring coupons, easy-to-use tools, and more manageable app settings — our app lets you shop and save with an improved experience. So, if you haven’t already, hurry and update your DG app

If you loved the DG app before, wait until you check out our new and improved updates! Featuring coupons, easy-to-use tools, and more manageable app settings — our app lets you shop and save with an improved experience. So, if you haven’t already, hurry and update your DG app
Fixed: Compatibility problem with some iOS devices made the application stop working on map screens.
Fixed: Compatibility problem with some iOS devices made the application stop working on map screens.
We heard you were having issues with our Store Locator. We think we’ve fixed it, so test it out and let us know!
We heard you were having issues with our Store Locator. We think we’ve fixed it, so test it out and let us know!
We’ve enhanced our app alerts and employee coupon availability! We’ve also fixed a couple of bugs.
We’ve enhanced our app alerts and employee coupon availability! We’ve also fixed a couple of bugs.
We apologize for the inconvenience this may cause our valued users but with the minor improvements made to the Dollar General mobile application you will be asked to re-login.
We apologize for the inconvenience this may cause our valued users but with the minor improvements made to the Dollar General mobile application you will be asked to re-login.

We sincerely apologize to those that were affected by the repeat notifications sent earlier this month. We have made several updates to the app to resolve this issue. We hope you will continue to use the app and provide your feedback as we work to improve the experience with every release.

We sincerely apologize to those that were affected by the repeat notifications sent earlier this month. We have made several updates to the app to resolve this issue. We hope you will continue to use the app and provide your feedback as we work to improve the experience with every release.
- New Shopping List feature to help you plan.
Thank you for using the Dollar General app! We’ve made several improvements and we’ve eliminated a few buggy issues. We’ll continue working to enhance the app with every release!
- New Shopping List feature to help you plan.
Thank you for using the Dollar General app! We’ve made several improvements and we’ve eliminated a few buggy issues. We’ll continue working to enhance the app with every release!

We’ve improved our sign-in and create account processes, so you may need to sign-in again. Try resetting your password if you have any trouble signing in. If you’re still having issues, contact us at DGDCP@dollargeneral.com.

We’re sorry for any inconvenience but we think you’re going to find the new sign-in process much easier!

We’ve improved our sign-in and create account processes, so you may need to sign-in again. Try resetting your password if you have any trouble signing in. If you’re still having issues, contact us at DGDCP@dollargeneral.com.

We’re sorry for any inconvenience but we think you’re going to find the new sign-in process much easier!

Welcome to the newly redesigned Dollar General app! You spoke. We listened. We’ve simplified the design and added a few new features we think you’ll enjoy.

• Simplified account set-up and onboarding experience
• Scan products with your phone and see related Digital Coupons
• Weekly Ad now available as a List View
• New Store Locator with Store Hours

Try it out – we hope you like it! (And check back often, as we are continuously updating the experience.)

DG GO! and Cart Calculator are now available! Scan items as you shop in store, discover deals, and track your total to stay on budget. In some stores, you can even check out and pay in the app!
